plot: A man tries to release a stalled movie made by his father 35 years ago, and find the actors worked in it.
title: Vellaripravinte Changathi
plot_es: A man tries to release a stalled movie made by his father 35 years ago, and find the actors worked in it.
plot_en: A man tries to release a stalled movie made by his father 35 years ago, and find the actors worked in it.
